attributes.name: Never use a PrintWriter after it has been closed

typestateRule.description: Using a PrintWriter after it has been closed will result in an exception.
typestateRule.example: final PrintWriter pWriter = getPrintWriter(); if ( isValid() ) { // Some code... pWriter.print( buffer ); //... } else { //... pWriter.close(); } //... pWriter.print( buffer ); Such code may potentially lead to an error state if the else clause is executed from a certain calling context.
